_sText:
This map uses the layout of "knas_speedcastle_css", which I enjoy playing quite a lot. My own version has a different theme and uses more possibilities or the source engine concerning lightning and amount of brushes, etc, while still being playable at decent fps rates. 

I used the pk01 texture pack, which can be freely used and modified. I tuned the normal maps a bit and included the ones needed for the map in the bsp file, so no stuff like installing the materials is needed.
A NAV File for the bots is included in the bsp. 

I hope you will enjoy playing this map, which I would claim to be a mix of a fun map and a optically quite serious map, though it has a unrealistic theme, of course. 

NOTE: This is a beta version. It is finished, but I might consider modifying some things after I got enough feedback - if there are any serious gameplay issues, for example. 

Go, go, go ;-)
